import { useMutation } from '@apollo/client' import { EDIT_AUTHOR } from '../queries' const Authors = (props) => { const [editAuthor] = useMutation(EDIT_AUTHOR) if (!props.show) { return null } const authors = [...props.authors] return (

authors

{authors.map((a) => ( ))}
born books
{a.name} {a.born} {a.bookCount}
) } export default Authors
